title: HORZE Moulin Crystal Dressage Whip
features: ✅ Add sparkling style to your ride with this whip
✅ Includes a leather-like handle inlaid with a twisting sparkle trim
description: Add a touch of sparkle to your ride with the Horze Moulin Crystal Dressage Whip. This stylish dressage whip features a leather feel handle with inlaid sparkle trim. A classic metallic cap adds a stylish touch for shows or schooling. Unlike most dressage whips, this whip features a leather popper end rather than a lash. This whip coordinates with the Horze Moulin collection. Features: Add sparkling style to your ride with this whip Includes a leather-like handle inlaid with a twisting sparkle trim Features a classic metallic cap Has a leather popper end
